sec.p: This project received financial support from the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (Discovery Grants to D.R.N. and A.E.M.N., CGS-D Scholarship to N.E.F.), a University of Guelph Research Chair (D.R.N.), Ontario Graduate Scholarship (A.O.S. and N.E.F.), the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry, Ontario Parks and a W. Garfield Weston Foundation Fellowship for Northern Conservation from the Wildlife Conservation Society (A.O.S.).
